-  `filterMag <#filtermag>`__
-  `phaseAmplitude <#phaseamplitude>`__

getBinaryLabel
==============

Convert training data to binary label for target class

Parameters
----------

-  ``fc`` **ee.FeatureCollection** Training data feature collection
-  ``property``
   **`string <https\://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global\_Objects/String>`__**
   Property label indicating class label
-  ``targetClass``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global\_Objects/Number>`__**
   Class to retain as 1 in binary label
-  ``option`` **ee.Dictionary** Parameter file containing the keys below

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** Training data where 1 = targetClass and
0 equals all other classes

getClassProbs
=============

Get class probability for each class in training data

Parameters
----------

-  ``fc`` **ee.FC** feature collection of training data
-  ``coefsToClassify`` **ee.Image** multi-band image of coefficients to
   classify
-  ``classList`` **list** classes to test probability of
-  ``classifier`` **ee.Classifier** in 'PROBABILITY' mode
-  ``property``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   label defining class in training data
-  ``options`` **dictionary** parameter file

Returns **ee.Image** image with each band being class probability for
each input class

makeGrids
=========

Make random grids in a region of interest

Parameters
----------

-  ``region`` **ee.Geometry** study region bounding geometry
-  ``count``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   number of random grids
-  ``size``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   length of one side of grid in m^2
-  ``seed``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   random number seed or 'random'

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** feature collection of random grids

newPhaseAmplitude
=================

Get phase and amplitude for a single spectral band

Parameters
----------

-  ``img`` **ee.Image** CCD results in long multi-band format
-  ``bands`` **List** List with the name of the bands for which to
   calculate ampl. and phase
-  ``sinName``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band suffix of the desired sine harmonic coefficient (e.g '\_SIN)
-  ``cosName``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band suffix of the desired sine harmonic coefficient (e.g '\_COS)

Returns **ee.Image** Image with two bands representing phase and
amplitude of the desired harmonic \*

sampleResultProcedure
=====================

Get training coefficient by reading from result data

Parameters
----------

-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with ccdc
   outputs saved in properties in addition to a date property
-  ``coefNames`` **List** coefficient abbreviated names in order of
   results
-  ``bandList`` **List** list of input band names in order
-  ``dateProperty``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   property name containing date in features
-  ``extraBands`` **List** ancillary bands to add as predictors
-  ``ccdcImage`` **ee.Image** Use ccdc coefficients instead of
   calculating on the fly
-  ``segs`` **List** Segment identifiers for ccdcImage parameter
-  ``ccdcDateFmt``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   date format of ccdc date format
-  ``trainingDateFmt``
-  ``scale``

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with coefficients
corresponding to specific date

runCcdcProcedure
================

Get training coefficient by running ccdc on every feature

Parameters
----------

-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with ccdc
   outputs saved in properties in addition to a date property
-  ``coefNames`` **List** coefficient abbreviated names in order of
   results
-  ``bandList`` **List** list of input band names in order
-  ``dateProperty``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   property name containing date in features
-  ``extraBands`` **List** ancillary bands to add as predictors
-  ``landsatParams``
   **`Object <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object>`__**
   parameters for 'getLandsat' function
-  ``segs`` **List** Segment identifiers for ccdcImage parameter

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with coefficients
corresponding to specific date

getTrainingCoefsAtDate
======================

Get coefficients at a given date for each feature in collection

Parameters
----------

-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with ccdc
   outputs saved in properties in addition to a date property
-  ``coefNames`` **List** coefficient abbreviated names in order of
   results (optional, default
   ``['INTP','SLP','COS','SIN','RMSE','COS2','SIN2','COS3','SIN3']``)
-  ``bandList`` **List** list of input band names in order (optional,
   default ``['BLUE','GREEN','RED','NIR','SWIR1','SWIR2']``)
-  ``dateProperty``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   property name containing date in features (optional, default
   ``'Start_Year'``)
-  ``extraBands`` **List** ancillary bands to add as predictors
   (optional, default ``null``)
-  ``ccdcImage`` **ee.Image** Use ccdc coefficients instead of
   calculating on the fly (optional, default ``null``)
-  ``segs`` **List** Segment identifiers for ccdcImage parameter
   (optional, default ``["S1","S2","S3","S4","S5","S6"]``)
-  ``ccdcDateFmt``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   date format of ccdc date format (optional, default ``1``)
-  ``trainingDateFmt``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   training data date format (according to ccdc syntax) (optional,
   default ``1``)
-  ``scale``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   spatial scale to sample training points at (optional, default ``30``)
-  ``landsatParams``
   **`Object <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Object>`__**
   parameters for 'getLandsat' function (optional, default
   ``{start:'1990-01-01',end:'2020-01-01'}``)

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with coefficients
corresponding to specific date

remapLC
=======

Remap training labels to GLANCE level 1 land cover

Parameters
----------

-  ``feats`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data feature collection
-  ``inLabel``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   attribute name containing land cover strings
-  ``outLabel``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   attribute name for output numeric land cover
-  ``inList`` **list** list of input land cover string values
-  ``outList`` **list** list of output land cover numeric values

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data feature collection with
numeric 'outLabel' column in each feature

assignIds
=========

Shuffle the sample and assign sample ID

Parameters
----------

-  ``sample`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data of point samples
-  ``attributeName``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   name to assign ID attribute to (optional, default ``ID``)

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data shuffled with unique ID
attribute

getMiddleDate
=============

Get the middle segment date of training data

Parameters
----------

-  ``fc`` **ee.FeatureCollection** Training data feature collection
-  ``startProp``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Property name of segment start year
-  ``endProp``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Property name of segment end year
-  ``middleProp``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Property name of calculated middle attribute

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** Training data with middleProp attribute

makeRow
=======

Make a row in a legend

Parameters
----------

-  ``color``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   the hex code or color name of the feature in the row
-  ``name``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   the name of the feature in the row

Returns **ui.Panel** a legend row

makeLegend
==========

Make a legend widget

Parameters
----------

-  ``classes``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of input classes
-  ``palette``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of color palette
-  ``title``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   legend title (optional) (optional, default ``'Legend'``)
-  ``width``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   width of panel (optional) (optional, default ``'250px'``)
-  ``position``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   position on map (optional) (optional, default ``'bottom-right'``)

Returns **ui.Panel** legend panel to display on map

getInputFeatures
================

Function to convert segment band names to universal band names to
classify

Parameters
----------

-  ``seg``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   segment number
-  ``imageToClassify`` **ee.Image** ccdc coefficient stack to classify
-  ``predictors``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of predictor variables
-  ``bandNames``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   band names of coefficient image
-  ``ancillary``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of ancillary data

Returns **ee.List** list of input features

Returns **ee.Image** bands of the ccdc stack to classify

makePhaseAmp
============

Calculate phase and amplitude from sin and cosine coefficients

Parameters
----------

-  ``img`` **ee.Image** ccdc coefficient image
-  ``bandNames``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   coefficient image band names

Returns **ee.Image** an image containing sin/cosine pairs

subsetTraining
==============

Subset training data into random training and testing data Data is
subset proportionally for each land cover class

Parameters
----------

-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data
-  ``trainProp`` **float** proportion of data to withhold for training
-  ``seed``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   seed for random selection of subset
-  ``classProperty``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   property containing the input class

Returns **ee.FeatureCollection** training data with 'train' attribute
where 1=training, 0=testing

accuracyProcedure
=================

Calculate accuracy metrics using a subset of the training data

Parameters
----------

-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data
-  ``imageToClassify`` **ee.Image** ccdc coefficient stack to classify
-  ``predictors``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of predictor variables as strings
-  ``bandNames``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of band names to classify
-  ``ancillary``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of ancillary predictor data
-  ``classifier`` **ee.Classifier** earth engine classifier with
   parameters
-  ``classProperty``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   attribute name with land cover label (optional, default ``'LC_Num'``)
-  ``seed``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   seed to use for the random column generator (optional, default
   ``'random'``)
-  ``trainProp`` **float** proportion of data to use subset for training
   (optional, default ``.4``)

Returns **ee.ConfusionMatrix** a confusion matrix as calculated by the
train/test subset

classifySegments
================

Classify stack of CCDC coefficient, band-seperated by segment

Parameters
----------

-  ``imageToClassify`` **ee.Image** ccdc coefficient stack to classify
-  ``numberOfSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   number of segments to classify
-  ``bandNames``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of band names to classify
-  ``ancillary``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of ancillary predictor data
-  ``ancillaryFeatures`` **ee.Image** ancillary data image
-  ``trainingData`` **ee.FeatureCollection** training data
-  ``classifier`` **ee.Classifier** earth engine classifier with
   parameters
-  ``studyArea`` **ee.Geometry** boundaries of region to classify
-  ``classProperty``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   attribute name with land cover label (optional, default ``'LC_Num'``)
-  ``coefs``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of coefficients to classify
-  ``trainProp`` **float** proportion of data to use subset for training
   (optional, default ``.4``)
-  ``seed``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   seed to use for the random column generator (optional, default
   ``'random'``)

Returns **ee.Image** classified stack of CCDC segments

parseConfMatrix
===============

Parse confusion matrix from string

Parameters
----------

-  ``im`` **ee.Image** classified image with confusion matrix in
   metadata
-  ``attribute``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   name of attribute with confusion matrix (optional, default
   ``'confMatrix'``)

getLcAtDate
===========

Calculate landcover at a date based on pre-classified segments

Parameters
----------

-  ``segs`` **ee.Image** classified ccd segment image
-  ``date``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   date of land cover to retrieve in format 'YYYY-MM-DD'
-  ``numberOfSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   number of segments in classification image
-  ``ccdVersion``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   version of ccd used for classification
-  ``metadataFilter``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   metadata used for classification of ccd
-  ``behavior``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   behavior when date is in between segments ('none','before','after')
-  ``bandNames``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of band names (such as "BLUE","GREEN")
-  ``inputFeatures``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   list of input feature names (such as "INTP" and "RMSE")

Returns **ee.Image** matchingDate landcover classification image at date
specified in parameter

getMode
=======

Get mode classification from a stack of overlapping result files

Parameters
----------

-  ``folder``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   the path to the folder containing the result files
-  ``matchingString``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   an identifier in the result file names

Returns **ee.Image** band-wise mode classification

buildSegmentTag
===============


Parameters
----------

-  ``nSegments``

buildSegmentTag
===============

Create sequence of segment strings

Parameters
----------

-  ``nSegments`` **Integer** Number of segments to create labels for

buildBandTag
============

Create sequence of band names for a given string tag

Parameters
----------

-  ``tag``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   String tag to use (e.g. 'RMSE')
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   List of band names to combine with tag

buildMagnitude
==============

Extract CCDC magnitude image

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

newBuildMagnitude
=================

Extract CCDC magnitude image from current CCDC result format

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

buildRMSE
=========

Extract CCDC RMSE image

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCDC results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

newBuildRMSE
============

Extract CCDC RMSE image from current CCDC formatted results

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCDC results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

buildCoefs
==========

Extract CCDC Coefficients

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

newBuildCoefs
=============

Extract CCDC Coefficients from current CCDC formatted result

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

buildStartEndBreakProb
======================

Extract CCDC tStart, tEnd, tBreak, changeProb

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments`` **integer** Number of segments to extract
-  ``tag``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Client-side string to use as name in the output bands

buildCcdcImage
==============

build a 74 x nSegments CCDC image using int32 as output.

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

newBuildCcdcImage
=================

build a 74 x nSegments CCDC image using int32 as output. Assumes current
CCDC format

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nSegments``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of segments to extract
-  ``bandList``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Client-side list with band names to use

getSyntheticForYear
===================

Create synthetic image for specified band

Parameters
----------

-  ``image`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results in long multi-band
   format
-  ``date``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Date to extract the segments for, in the format that ccd was run in
-  ``band``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band name to use for creation of synthetic image
-  ``segs``

getMultiSynthetic
=================

Create synthetic image for a list of bands

Parameters
----------

-  ``image`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results in long multi-band
   format
-  ``date``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Date to extract the segments for, in the format that ccd was run in
-  ``bandList``
-  ``segs``
-  ``band``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   List of bands to get synthetic data for

fillNoData
==========

Replace nodata in CCD output and fill with zeros

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nCoefs``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of coefficients present in the results
-  ``nBands``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of spectral bands used to produce the results
-  ``clipGeom`` **ee.Geometry** Geometry of the image that is being
   masked

newFillNoData
=============

Replace nodata in CCD output and fill with zeros Assumes current CCDC
result format

Parameters
----------

-  ``fit`` **ee.Image** Image with CCD results
-  ``nCoefs``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of coefficients present in the results
-  ``nBands``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Number of spectral bands used to produce the results
-  ``clipGeom`` **ee.Geometry** Geometry of the image that is being
   masked

date\_to\_days
==============

Return a date as days from 01-01-0000

Parameters
----------

-  ``str_date``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Date in the format accepted by ee.Date

Returns **ee.Number** Date expressed as days since 01-01-0000

filter\_coefs
=============

Filter coefficients for a given date using a mask

Parameters
----------

-  ``ccd_results`` **ee.Image** CCD results in long multi-band format
-  ``date``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Date in the same format that CCD was run with
-  ``band``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band to select.
-  ``coef``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Coef to select. Options are "INTP", "SLP", "COS", "SIN", "COS2",
   "SIN2", "COS3", "SIN3", "RMSE", "MAG"
-  ``seg_names``
-  ``behavior``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Method to find intersecting ('normal') or closest segment to given
   date ('before' or 'after') if no segment intersects directly

Returns **ee.Image** Single band image with the values for the selected
band/coefficient

normalizeIntercept
==================

Normalize the intercept to the middle of the segment time period,
instead of the 0 time period.

Parameters
----------

-  ``intercept`` **ee.Image** Image band representing model intercept
-  ``start`` **ee.Image** Image band representing model slope date
-  ``end`` **ee.Image** Image band representing model end date
-  ``slope`` **ee.Image** Image band representing model slope

Returns **ee.Image** Image band representing normalized intercept.

get\_coef
=========

Get image of with a single coefficient for all bands

Parameters
----------

-  ``ccd_results``
-  ``date``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Date in the same format that CCD was run with
-  ``band_list``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   List of all bands to include.
-  ``coef``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   Coef to select. Options are "INTP", "SLP", "COS", "SIN", "COS2",
   "SIN2", "COS3", "SIN3", "RMSE", "MAG"
-  ``seg_names``
-  ``behavior``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Method to find intersecting ('normal') or closest segment to given
   date ('before' or 'after') if no segment intersects directly
-  ``ccd`` **ee.Image** results CCD results in long multi-band format

Returns **ee.Image** coefs Image with the values for the selected bands
x coefficient

apply\_norm
===========

Apply normalization to intercepts

Parameters
----------

-  ``band_coefs`` **ee.Image** Band x coefficients image. Must include
   slopes
-  ``seg_start`` **ee.Image** Image with dates representing the start of
   the segment
-  ``seg_end`` **ee.Image** Image with dates representing the end of the
   segment

Returns **ee.Image** band\_coefs Updated input image with normalized
intercepts

get\_multi\_coefs
=================

Get image of with bands x coefficients given in a list

Parameters
----------

-  ``ccd_results``
-  ``date``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Date in the same format that CCD was run with
-  ``band_list``
   **`array <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Array>`__**
   List of all bands to include. Options are "B1", "B2", "B3", "B4",
   "B5", "B6", "B7"
-  ``coef_list`` **list** List of coefs to select. Options are "INTP",
   "SLP", "COS", "SIN", "COS2", "SIN2", "COS3", "SIN3", "RMSE", "MAG"
-  ``cond``
   **`boolean <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Boolean>`__**
   Normalize intercepts? If true, requires "INTP" and "SLP" to be
   selected in coef\_list.
-  ``seg_names`` **ee.List** List of segment names to use.
-  ``behavior``
-  ``ccd`` **ee.Image** results CCD results in long multi-band format

Returns **ee.Image** coefs Image with the values for the selected bands
x coefficients

getChanges
==========

Filter segments with change in a given range

Parameters
----------

-  ``ccd_results``
-  ``startDate``
   **`Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Start date in the format that was used to run CCD
-  ``endDate``
   **`Number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   End date in the format that was used to run CCD
-  ``seg_names`` **ee.List** List of segment names matching the number
   of segments in the bands
-  ``ccd`` **ee.Image** results CCD results in long multi-band format

Returns **ee.Image** Mask image indicating which pixel/segments have
changes in the specified time range. \*

filterMag
=========

Obtain change with largest magnitude, timing of that break, and total
number of breaks for a given date range and band

Parameters
----------

-  ``ccd_results``
-  ``startDate``
   **`number <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Number>`__**
   Start date in the format that was used to run CCD
-  ``endDate`` **sumber** End date in the format that was used to run
   CCD
-  ``band``
   **`string <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Spectral band
-  ``seg_names`` **ee.List** List of segment names matching the number
   of segments in the bands
-  ``ccd`` **ee.Image** results CCD results in long multi-band format

Returns **ee.Image** Image with three bands indicating: 1) Magnitude of
the largest break for the given date range 2) Timing of largest break
(in the time units CCDC was run in) 3) Total number of breaks in the
date range \*

phaseAmplitude
==============

Get phase and amplitude for a single spectral band

Parameters
----------

-  ``img``
-  ``bands`` **List** List with the name of the bands for which to
   calculate ampl. and phase
-  ``sinName``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band suffix of the desired sine harmonic coefficient (e.g '\_SIN)
-  ``cosName``
   **`String <https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/String>`__**
   Band suffix of the desired sine harmonic coefficient (e.g '\_COS)
-  ``ccd`` **ee.Image** results CCD results in long multi-band format

Returns **ee.Image** Image with two bands representing phase and
amplitude of the desired harmonic \*
